title: Very thin, duplicate product don't buy
body: It's complete waste of money. Very thin like tissue paper and needs to be changed frequently. Don't buy it and sad part is there is no return or refund on it. Please check the video review that already someone has posted. Unfortunately, I didnt see that before buying

title: 'Pathetic product full Waste of money'
body: Disgusting product delivered. It doesn't stick to your panty. Complete waste of money. Please don't buy from Amazon. They deliver out of stock goods which cannot be used in need.

title: 'It sells horrible'
body: I don't know if it's the original product because this one smells so bad. There's too much added fragrance. I have never experienced this kind of smell before.

body: Do not buy this pads from amazon these stick to the cloth so badly when i pulled it off the pad tears apart. Maybe it's a first copy or something i don't know but it is not the actual product for sure.

body: The strong scent/fragrance added to it in new packaging causes headache and is terrible... won't buy again...

body: 'Order was deleivered at my work place. Box was damaged. One item was missing'

title: 'Very low quality product'
body: 'The quality of product is very bad I guess for amazon they are making inferior quality pads to compensate for large discounts. Very thin lining does not last even for an hour'

title: 'Terrible scent that gives headaches'
body: 'Someone decided they should put a strong scent on this sanitary napkin. The strong scent gives me headaches and is unnecessary. The earlier product with the fragrance was a 5-star product. Considering switching brands.'
